name: SpaceInvasion
description:
SpaceInvasion


As a commander of an imperial space force you will conquer unexplored planets, create colonies and equip your fleet for attack or defense. Strategic warfare is the focus of Spaceinvasion!

The following await you in the browser game SpaceInvasion
  • build mines, blast furnaces, weapon factories and research buildings
  • produce Pig Iron, Metal, Kryptonite and Spice
  • build defense units to protect your planet
  • build ships to attack your opponents
  • Start technology research to unlock more features or improve your technologies
  • Join other players in alliances!
  • Lead political in your alliances and carry out invasions (wars) against other alliances
  • Start your own invasion every week against the alien races
  • Fight together with other players against your opponents. Espionage, tactics and save flights must be timed correctly!
  • Don't like PVP? Use the spectral mode to build your empire in peace!
  • In the shop you have access to traders, construction, espionage and save assistants

Your Colonies

SpaceInvasion is a stragetic space simulation browser game: as a commander you will battle for domination in the universe. From your planets fleet squadrons will launch into space with the mission to colonize new planets and capture precious resources. You will build an industrial infrastructure, establish weapons factories and defenses to protect your base.

The Invasion

Team up with other players to form powerful alliances or fight alone through interstellar battles: to become the most powerful fleet admiral strategic warfare is required. Spy probes report important information about the enemy, through effective research resource production is increased as well as effective energy use in attacks and defense keeps your figher squadron prepared for fleet maneuvers!
